h3_title: Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: He can also shoot lightning directly out of his mouth in a beam of energy. This can happen both when he's on the ground in a quick straight burst right in front of him, or when floating above you in a quick sweep in front of him, and both need quick dodges to stop a quick attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chen_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Chen Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Chen Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can also shoot lightning directly out of his mouth in a beam of energy. This can happen both when he's on the ground in a quick straight burst right in front of him, or when floating above you in a quick sweep in front of him, and both need quick dodges to stop a quick attack.
